text: Tomás Balcázar González (May 4, 1931 – April 26, 2020)Some sources state that he was born on 21 December 1931, while others state he was born on 4 May 1931 was a Mexican footballer. He played as a forward. He played at club level for C.D. Guadalajara from 1948 to 1958 and internationally for Mexico from 1953 to 1954. Balcázar was born in Guadalajara, Mexico. Balcázar died on April 26, 2020 in Guadalajara, aged 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican footballers
title: Tomás Balcázar
